hero.subheading: Takulandilani ku Beta yathu! Iyi ndi pulojekiti yotseguka, yopanda phindu yodzipereka kuthandiza anthu kuphunzira luso laukadaulo ndi aphunzitsi a AI komanso gulu la alangizi amtsogolo.

code.line1: AI: Tiyeni tiphunzire za React hooks!

pillars.ai_desc: Pezani mayankho pompopompo ndi chitsogozo chamunthu payekha kuchokera ku AI yomwe imakhalapo nthawi zonse kuti ikuthandizeni kuphunzira.
pillars.mentor_desc: Lumikizanani ndi alangizi odziwa bwino ntchito kuti mupeze upangiri weniweni ndi chithandizo (zikubwera posachedwa).
pillars.opensource_desc: Yomangidwa ndi anthu, kwa anthu. Thandizirani ndikukula nafe paulendo wathu.

features.heading: Chifukwa Chiyani Musankhe AI Mphunzitsi?
features.subheading: Patsani mwayi wophunzira mwapadera ndi AI yamakono

0.title: AI Mphunzitsi Wanzeru
0.description: Landirani mayankho mwachangu komanso mwapadera kuchokera kwa AI wathu amene amamvetsetsa njira yanu yophunzirira ndikusintha liwiro lanu.

1.title: Njira Yophunzira Yokonzedwa
1.description: AI yathu imapanga njira yanu yophunzirira kutengera zolinga, luso lanu komanso njira zomwe mumakonda.

2.title: Thandizo la Gulu
2.description: Lumikizanani ndi ophunzira ena ambirimbiri m'gulu lathu lothandizira. Gawani kupita patsogolo, pemphani thandizo, ndi kugwira ntchito pamapulojekiti limodzi.

3.title: Mapulojekiti Enieni
3.description: Pangani mapulojekiti omwe angakuwonetseni ndi chitsogozo cha akatswiri komanso AI yothandizira kuwunika code yanu.

4.title: Kuwunika Kupita Patsogolo
4.description: Kuwunika mwatsatanetsatane komanso kutsatira kupita patsogolo kumakuthandizani kukhala ndi chidwi komanso kuona kukula kwanu.

5.title: Kupezeka 24/7
5.description: Phunzirani nthawi iliyonse yomwe mungathe. AI mphunzitsi wathu alipo nthawi zonse.

cta.heading: Mwakonzeka Kuyamba Ulendo Wanu wa Coding?
cta.subheading: Lumikizani ndi ophunzira ambiri omwe akusintha ntchito zawo ndi nsanja yathu ya AI.

footer.company_description: Kuthandiza ulendo wanu wophunzira ndi AI. Kulitsani luso lanu, kwatulani kuthekera kwanu.
footer.newsletter_description: Pezani zambiri zaposachedwa pa makalasi atsopano ndi malangizo a AI
footer.all_rights_reserved: Maulamuliro onse ndi otetezedwa. Zopangidwa ndi

login.signInToContinue: Lowani kuti mupitilize ulendo wanu wophunzira
login.popupBlocked: Popup yadatsekedwa. Chonde lolani popups patsambali ndikuyesanso.
